title: Background Image Loading for Tracing

criteria.text: PNG and JPG images load as background reference
criteria.notes: ImageTrace::load() supports PNG/JPG via image crate with jpeg feature enabled
opacity field on ImageTrace (0.0-1.0), adjust_scale method, toggle_visible, uniform buffer updated each frame
shaders/canvas_2d.wgsl with vertex/fragment shaders, textureSample with opacity uniform

criteria.text: Drawing works correctly on top of background image
criteria.notes: Image renders first (LoadOp::Load), then grid/outlines rendered on top via Canvas2D::render()

checklist.item: Implement PNG/JPG image loading for background
Add opacity slider for background transparency
Ensure drawing renders correctly on top of background
